feed.title: The Apollos Project Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest The Apollos Project news and events.

entry.title: Release Notes: v1.5
entry.summary: Today, we’re announcing our next general release, Apollos 1.5. Apollos 1.5 is part 1 in a 2-part release journey focused on reliability and our investment in developer flexibility.
